title: Definition of direct variation
text: In a direct relationship, variables are directly proportional. This means that as $$x$$ increases, $$y$$ increases, and vice versa.

title: General form
text: If "y varies directly as the square root of x," then the general form of our relationship will be $$y=\operatorname{ksqrt}\left(x\right)$$.

title: Solving for k.
text: Substitute $$x=36$$ and $$y=24$$ into our relationship $$y$$ $$=$$ $$\operatorname{ksqrt}\left(x\right)$$, to solve for k. What do you get?

title: Put it all together
text: Now all you have to do is substitute k into the general form to get your equation!
